Title: Relates to prohibiting homeless shelters from denying shelter to a person because the person is considered to have other housing available
Summary: Prohibits homeless shelters from denying shelter to a person because the person is considered to have other housing available unless the department of social services determines that such other housing is actually available, would not cause overcrowding, or put any person at unreasonable health or safety risk.
LawCode: Amd ยง17, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to homeless persons seeking shelter
